text: Male is the fifth studio album by Australian singer Natalie Imbruglia, released by Portrait on 31 July 2015. It was released in Europe on 21 August 2015.https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/male/id977282806https://itunes.apple.com/ie/album/male/id977282806https://itunes.apple.com/de/album/male/id977282806https://itunes.apple.com/au/album/male/id977282806 Male is Imbruglia's first album in six years and features the singer covering tracks made famous by male-led acts, hence the album's title. ==Critical reception== Male received generally positive reviews from music critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a normalised rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream critics, the album received an average score of 65, which indicates "generally favorable reviews", based on four reviews by critics.https://www.metacritic.com/music/male/natalie-imbruglia/critic-reviews ==Tour== On 7 February 2017, Imbruglia announced that she would embark on the 2017 Acoustic Tour in support of the album, which took place from April to May 2017. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2015) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- |- |- |} ==Release history== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- !
